welcome_message_body: Welcome to Boksburg, a charming city known for its rich mining history and vibrant community. We invite you to explore our unique blend of culture, history, and natural beauty and enjoy your time here.

restaurants.name: Orahma Roadhouse
restaurants.description: Orahma Roadhouse is a restaurant located in Boksburg.

restaurants.name: Casa do Campo
restaurants.description: Casa do Campo is a gastropub located in Boksburg.

restaurants.name: The Classic India
restaurants.description: The Classic India is a indian restaurant located in Boksburg.
restaurants.address: Lower Level, Key Largo Centre, Boksburg

restaurants.name: RocoMamas
restaurants.description: RocoMamas is a burger joint located in the city.

restaurants.name: ilGusto Ristorante
restaurants.description: ilGusto Ristorante is a mediterranean restaurant located in Boksburg.
restaurants.address: Key Largo Centre (Cnr North Rand Rd. & Trichardts Rd.), Boksburg

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rand/Germiston Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Rand/Germiston Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

airports.airport_name: Oliver Reginald Tambo International (Jan Smuts International)

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Oliver Reginald Tambo International Airport serves flights to and from destinations outside of South Africa.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Oliver Reginald Tambo International Airport serves flights within South Africa.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Grand Central Airport serves domestic flights within South Africa.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pilanesberg Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lanseria Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Lanseria Airport, mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
